title: Bitcoin Dominance
description: Tracks Bitcoin's market cap share compared to the top 9 (non-stablecoin) shitcoins.

title: Bitcoin UTXO Distributions
description: Visualizes the distributions of UTXOs, both by counts and by value.

title: Bitcoin vs Gold $50 Weekly DCA
description: Compares the returns of a $50 weekly DCA in bitcoin vs gold.

title: Block Size
description: Shows each block size with smaller epoch windows on the side.

title: Days at a Loss
description: Shows the number of days purchases made at each daily high were at a loss.

title: Days Since All-Time High
description: Shows the number of days since Bitcoin's last all-time high.

title: Difficulty and Target
description: Shows block hashes and difficulty targets.

title: HODL Waves
description: Shows UTXO age distribution over time to visualize HODLing behavior.

title: Inflation Rate
description: Shows Bitcoin's annualized monetary inflation rate.

title: Price Distribution
description: Shows the number of daily closes in between each price range.

title: Price Distribution by Market Cap
description: Shows the number of daily closes in between each market cap range.

title: Supply Distribution & Age By Realized Price
description: Shows the prices and ages of the circulating bitcoin supply.

title: Bitcoin 1Y/2Y/3Y/4Y Windows
description: Bitcoin chart with 1 year, 2 year, 3 year, & 4 year windows.
